name: Development Finance Institutions
description: Disbursements from Development Finance Insitutions (excluding disbursements recorded as ODA or OOFs)

name: Foreign Direct Investment
description: Net inflows of foreign direct investment (new investments minus disinvestment)

name: Profits on FDI
description: Outflows of profits on foreign direct investment

name: Foreign Direct Investment
description: Net outflows of foreign direct investment (new investments minus disinvestment)

name: Long-term debt (commercial sources)
description: Disbursments of long-term debt from commercial creditors

name: Long-term debt (official sources)
description: Disbursments of long-term debt from official creditors, excluding disbursements reported as ODA or OOFs

name: Remittances
source: World Bank Migration and Remittances Factbook

name: Remittances
source: World Bank Migration and Remittances Factbook

name: Short-term debt
description: Net disbursements of short-term debt (debt with a maturity of less than 1 year; net disbursements are gross inflows minus capital repayments)

name: Remittances
source: World Bank Migration and Remittances Factbook

name: Official development assistance
description: Receipt of capital repayments on ODA loans

description: Receipt of interest payments on ODA loans

name: Other official flows
description: Receipt of interest payments on OOF loans

name: Development Finance Institutions
description: Activities by bilateral development finance institutions (excluding those reported as ODA or OOFs)
